overview: Oru Mukkona Kadhal kadhai (ஒரு முக்கோண காதல் கதை ) is director turned cinematographer Balu Mahendra's first short film under his direction. This short film was released in 2000, under the Kadhai Neram TV series. This heart-rending short film comprises of leading cine actors in prominent roles.  Tamil Short Film | Balu Mahendra | Mounika | Vetri Maaran | Tamil Movies
title: Oru Mukkona Kadhal kadhai
